attributes.action: De select yvette Cooper for misrepresentation of her constuency
attributes.additional_details: 70% of the people who voted to leave the EU in Castleford are being misrepresented by yvette's and her rouge attitude to her constuency who voted her into power on her pretence she would see brexit delivered.
attributes.background: Yvette's constuency voted in favour of leaving the EU she is misrepresenting the people who voted her into office

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it is not something the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

The selection of parliamentary candidates is the responsibility of their political party.
